channel.title: LGBTQ+ on Ember
channel.description: Recent content in LGBTQ+ on Ember

item.title: Voice Training Compilation
item.description: Ember’s compilation of voice training tips and guides Most of these are for voice feminization, but the techniques can be used the other way In no particular order: Voice Quills’ twitter thread (Nitter mirror) Trans voice lessons (youtube channel) L’s voice training guide (Reddit) AmaRoseLessons (youtube channel) The “One-Step” To PERFECT Voice Feminization (youtube video) Solid introductory voice training resources (r/transvoice pinned post)
item.content:encoded:
Ember’s compilation of voice training tips and guides

Most of these are for voice feminization, but the techniques can be used the other way

In no particular order:

  • Voice Quills’ twitter thread (Nitter mirror)
  • Trans voice lessons (youtube channel)
  • L’s voice training guide (Reddit)
  • AmaRoseLessons (youtube channel)
  • The “One-Step” To PERFECT Voice Feminization (youtube video)
  • Solid introductory voice training resources (r/transvoice pinned post)
